## hpr3839 :: Rip a CD in the terminal

 Wiki
ABCDE
Wiki
Github
ABCDE Github page
Git
ABCDE Git page
Ask Ubuntu page

abcde.conf "abcde CD ripping
configuration file"

Custom abcde configuration file

For only ogg,mp3,flac and opus
custom-abcde.conf
"abcde CD ripping configuration file"

freedb.freedb.org is dead; use gnudb.gnudb.org
instead
Bugzilla entry for
freedb.org
Updated CDDB location in .abcde.conf
CDDBURL="http://gnudb.gnudb.org/~cddb/cddb.cgi"
Alias in BASH
alias ripcd.mp3='abcde -o mp3'
alias ripcd.opus='abcde -o opus'
alias ripcd.ogg='abcde -o ogg'
alias ripcd.opus='abcde -o opus'
More Info
https://askubuntu.com/questions/788327/use-abcde-to-produce-high-quality-flac-and-mp3-output-with-album-art-under-xenia#788757
abcde -o 'flac:-8,mp3:-b 320' -G
